title.narrative: P4: Pacific Regional Connectivity Program Phase 4: KI: Connectivity Project

description.narrative: The Project development objective is to reduce the cost and increase the availability of Internet services in Kiribati.

condition.narrative: Signature by Kiribati, Nauru and FSM of a legally binding Construction and Maintenance Agreement in form and substance acceptableto IDA. Deadline 24 months after Effective Date Section I.B.2(a) of Schedule 2 to the FA.Design by Kiribati of its StrategicAsset Management Plan for cable infrastructure assets for this and other projects. Deadline 24 months after Effective Date.Section I.B.4(a) of Schedule 2 to the FA.Establishment of the national cable operator: Deadline 6 months after Effective Date.Section I.B.1(a) of Schedule 2 to the FA.Prepare and adopt a Project Operations Manual: Deadline 3 months after Effective Date.Section I.E of Schedule 2 to the FA.Carry out a Mid-term review: Deadline 30 months after Effective Date. Section II.A.2 ofSchedule 2 to the FA.
